alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 7:28AM EST until February 01 at 6:33PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Richland and Lexington Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River at Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. At 119.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman Facility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:38 AM EST Saturday the stage was 112.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 115.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 118.5 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 730 PM EST.
